title: Game Progress Route
content:
previously and made a deal with him, he will interrupt your conversation demanding to get paid. After this, True Soul Nere will ask you if you side with him or against him.

Afterward, head to the corpse of Nere and remove his head. Before you do, loot his corpse first to obtain the Broken Moonlantern which will trigger a cutscene where you can inspect it. Choose from the following:

[Investigation] Inspect the lantern in more detail [ARCANA] Examine the dust within the lantern Leave.
